details: An extra challenge is generated for fights against creatures in the Beach Monsters family.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in the Madrestam Harbour area.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Blacksmith Dungeon.
The loot generated by Perceptors is increased by 200% in all areas.
The quantity of ores harvested by miners of all levels is increased by 100%.
The chances of obtaining loot from Count Harebourg, his four lieutenants and all their creatures are increased by 75%.
Experience gained by fighting Snowfoux is increased by 75%.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 200% in the Plantala area.
The quantity of Freyesque Orchids harvested by alchemists is increased by 150%.
All varieties of Almond Dragoturkey will give birth to one extra baby.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Turtle Beach area are increased by 100%.
The quality of items crafted in the city of Frigost Village is increased.
Experience gained in the Fungus Cavern area is increased by 100%.
Handymen have a 10% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items.
The quantity of Cherry Wood harvested by lumberjacks is increased by 125%.
An extra challenge is generated for fights against monsters in the Dreggon Village and Dreggon Tunnels areas.
The chances of obtaining loot from Bulbushes are increased by 150%.
Experience gains are increased by 125% in Crocabulia's Lair.
Bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 250% against Spitfoux.
The quantity of Wheat harvested by farmers is increased by 125%.

bonus: Magik Riktus Loot, XP, and Challenges
details: Experience gains and chances of obtaining loot from creatures in the Magik Riktus family are increased by 50%. An extra challenge is generated and bonuses gained by completing challenges are increased by 75% against creatures in the Magik Riktus family.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Coral Beach area.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Tree Keeholo Foliage area are increased by 100%.
Experience gained by fighting Field Plants is increased by 75%.
Resources will reappear 150% more quickly than usual in the Desolation of Sidimote area.
Craftsmen have a 15% chance of keeping their ingredients when they craft items in the Pandala Village area.
The chances of obtaining loot in the Lair of the Giant Kralove dungeon are increased by 125%.
The reward bonus on groups of monsters increases every 3 hours in the Arak-hai Forest area.
The quantity of Contaminated Meat harvested by Hunters is increased by 125%.
Experience gained in the Minotoror Island area is increased by 100%.
